title: Adam Thomas parties with pregnant Lucy Mecklenburgh and ex-Emmerdale castmates
text:

Former Emmerdale star Adam Thomas was joined by his soap pals to celebrate the launch of his swanky new bar in Manchester on Thursday night.

Joining Adam was his brother Ryan Thomas , a former Coronation Street star, and his pregnant fiancee Lucy Meck as they opened The Spin Bar and Restaurant in Gatley.

Lucy was glowing in a cream knitted midi dress and strappy heels, while she cuddled Ryan and talked to his brothers Adam and Scott at the event.

The brunette beauty recently revealed that she and hubby-to-be Ryan are expecting a baby boy after announcing their pregnancy just last month.

Also joining the bash to support him was Corrie's Alan Halsall, ex Hollyoaks star Chris Fountain, Danny Miller from Emmerdale, Anthony Quinlan and Liam Fox.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: FARRELL / BACKGRID)

Adam, 31, left the show in 2017 having landed roles in new productions, but he decided to take the plunge and pursue his dream of opening a bar earlier this year.

Feeling grateful for his shot at something new, the star shared a heartfelt post on Instagram .

(Image: FARRELL / BACKGRID)

Adam wrote: "For me it's always been a dream to own my own bar one day and I've done it!

"Theres not much that am proud of but standing in your own bar, a project that you have been working on for months..."

He added: "So for anyone wanting to take a jump into the unknown, go for it...take a chance... live !!

"It was a successful weekend but there's still along way to go and a lot of lessons to be learnt and it's going to be hard work... but nothing great ever came easy."

He also admitted he was nervous about his new business venture, and said if it doesn't work out, at least he took the jump.

An emotional Adam also claimed he wants to do something to make his children proud.
description: The former Emmerdale star has taken on a new business venture - and his co-stars and brother joined him for the launch
